pages.text: CC: Tweaked is a fork of the original ComputerCraft mod that adds programmable computers and turtles to Minecraft. $(br2)Use the Lua programming language to automate tasks, manage resources, and build advanced contraptions.
Start by crafting a Computer or Turtle, then write your first program. $(br2)Programs can be used to control redstone, gather resources, and interact with other blocks or players.
Explore the extensive API documentation to unlock the full potential of your devices. $(br2)Build automated mining rigs, complex factories, or interactive chatbots with CC: Tweaked!
